landing.tagline: A calm command center for boards, agents, and approvals.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.signInPrompt: Sign in to access the dashboard.

boards.title: Boards
boards.noBoardsDesc: Create your first board to start routing tasks and monitoring work across agents.
boards.deleteConfirm: This will remove the board. This action cannot be undone.
boards.createDesc: Boards organize tasks and agents by mission context.
boards.signInCreate: Sign in to create a board.
boards.adminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can create boards.
boards.descriptionPlaceholder: What context should the lead agent know before onboarding?
boards.noGatewaysAvailable: No gateways available. Create one in {link} to continue.
boards.noGatewaysPrefix: No gateways available. Create one in
boards.selectGatewayRequired: Select a gateway before creating a board.
boards.maxAgentsInvalid: Max worker agents must be a non-negative integer.
boards.editAdminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can edit board settings.
boards.webhookDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe exactly what the lead agent should do when payloads arrive.
boards.successMetricsInvalidJson: Success metrics must be valid JSON.
boards.startOnboardingHint: Start onboarding to draft an objective and success metrics.
boards.descriptionContextPlaceholder: What context should the lead agent know?
boards.successMetricsHint: Add key outcomes so the lead agent can measure progress.
boards.requireApprovalDesc: Require at least one linked approval in approved state before a task can be marked done.
boards.requireReviewBeforeDoneDesc: Tasks must move to review before they can be marked done.
boards.blockStatusChanges: Block status changes with pending approval
boards.blockStatusChangesDesc: Prevent status transitions while any linked approval is in pending state.
boards.onlyLeadCanChangeStatusDesc: Restrict status changes to the board lead.
boards.webhooksDesc: Add inbound webhook endpoints so the lead agent can react to external events.

boardGroups.title: Board groups
boardGroups.signInPrompt: Sign in to view board groups.
boardGroups.description: Group boards so agents can see related work.
boardGroups.noGroupsDesc: Create a board group to increase cross-board visibility for agents.
boardGroups.deleteConfirm: This will remove the group. Boards will be ungrouped. This action cannot be undone.
boardGroups.createDesc: Groups help agents discover related work across boards.
boardGroups.signInCreate: Sign in to create a board group.
boardGroups.signInEdit: Sign in to edit board groups.
boardGroups.descriptionPlaceholder: What ties these boards together? What should agents coordinate on?
boardGroups.boardsOptional: Optional. Selected boards will be assigned to this group.
boardGroups.editDesc: Update the shared context that connects boards in this group.

agents.title: Agents
agents.description: Manage agents connected to your boards.
agents.noAgentsDesc: Create your first agent to start executing tasks on this board.
agents.deleteConfirm: This will remove the agent. This action cannot be undone.
agents.adminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can access agents.
agents.createDesc: Agents start in provisioning until they check in.
agents.signInCreate: Sign in to create an agent.
agents.createBoardFirst: Create a board before adding agents.
agents.intervalDesc: How often this agent runs HEARTBEAT.md (10m, 30m, 2h).
agents.intervalEditDesc: Set how often this agent runs HEARTBEAT.md.
agents.noActivity: No activity yet for this agent.
agents.reviewDesc: Review agent health, session binding, and recent activity.
agents.adminOnlyCreate: Only organization owners and admins can create agents.
agents.createBoardBeforeAssign: Create a board before assigning agents.
agents.gatewayMainDesc: Uses the gateway main session key and is not tied to a single board.
agents.gatewayMainBoardNote: Main agents are not attached to a board. If a board is selected, it is only used to resolve the gateway main session key and will be cleared on save.
agents.statusHeartbeat: Status is controlled by agent heartbeat.
agents.selectBoardRequired: Select a board before creating an agent.
agents.selectBoardOrGateway: Select a board or mark this agent as the gateway main.
agents.selectBoardForGateway: Select a board once so we can resolve the gateway main session key.

gateways.title: Gateways
gateways.description: Manage OpenClaw gateway connections used by boards
gateways.noGatewaysDesc: Create your first gateway to connect boards and start managing your OpenClaw connections.
gateways.deleteConfirm: This removes the gateway connection from Mission Control. Boards using it will need a new gateway assigned.
gateways.adminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can access gateways.
gateways.createDesc: Configure an OpenClaw gateway for mission control.
gateways.signInCreate: Sign in to create a gateway.
gateways.adminOnlyCreate: Only organization owners and admins can create gateways.
gateways.signInView: Sign in to view a gateway.
gateways.signInEdit: Sign in to edit a gateway.
gateways.editDesc: Update connection settings for this OpenClaw gateway.
gateways.adminOnlyEdit: Only organization owners and admins can edit gateways.
gateways.noAgentsAssigned: No agents assigned to this gateway.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Classify and group tasks across your boards.
tags.deleteConfirmSuffix: from all tagged tasks. This action cannot be undone.
tags.noTagsDesc: Create tags to classify and group tasks across your boards.
tags.deleteConfirm: This will remove the tag from all tagged tasks. This action cannot be undone.
tags.adminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can manage tags.
tags.createDesc: Define a reusable tag for task grouping.
tags.editDesc: Update tag details used across task boards.
tags.slugHint: Leave slug blank to auto-generate from the tag name.

customFields.title: Custom fields
customFields.signInPrompt: Sign in to manage custom fields.
customFields.description: Configure custom fields for your organization's tasks.
customFields.adminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can manage custom fields.
customFields.noFieldsDesc: Create organization-level custom fields that appear on every task.
customFields.createDesc: Create an organization-level custom field and bind it to one or more boards.
customFields.signInCreate: Sign in to manage custom fields.
customFields.signInEdit: Sign in to manage custom fields.
customFields.editDesc: Update custom-field metadata and board bindings.
customFields.fieldKeyReadOnly: Field key cannot be changed after creation.
customFields.defaultValuePlaceholder: Optional default value. For booleans use "true"/"false"; for JSON use an object or array.
customFields.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description used by agents and UI
customFields.boardBindingsHint: Required. The custom field appears on tasks in selected boards.

settings.title: Settings
settings.signInPrompt: Sign in to manage your settings.
settings.description: Update your profile and account preferences.
settings.profileDesc: Keep your identity and timezone up to date.
settings.name: Name
settings.deleteAccountDesc: This permanently removes your Mission Control account and related personal data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountConfirm: Your account and personal data will be permanently deleted.

organization.title: Organization
organization.signInPrompt: Sign in to manage your organization.
organization.description: Manage members and board access across your workspace.
organization.deleteOrgConfirm: This will permanently delete the organization, including boards, groups, gateways, members, and invites. This action cannot be undone.
organization.membersInvitesDesc: Invite teammates and tune their board permissions.
organization.createBoardForAccess: Create a board to start assigning access.
organization.adminOnlyInvite: Only organization admins can invite new members.
organization.manageMemberDesc: Adjust board permissions and role for this teammate.

activity.title: Live feed
activity.signInPrompt: Sign in to view the feed.
activity.description: Realtime task, approval, agent, and board-chat activity across all boards.
activity.waitingDesc: When updates happen, they will show up here.

skills.addPackDesc: Add a new skill URL pack for your organization.
skills.signInPacks: Sign in to add skill packs.
skills.signInEditPack: Sign in to edit skill packs.
skills.packAdminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can manage skill packs.
skills.packDescPlaceholder: Short summary shown in the packs list.
skills.packUrlInvalid: Pack URL must be a GitHub repository URL.
skills.signInManagePacks: Sign in to manage skill packs.
skills.noPacksDesc: Add your first skill URL pack to get started.
skills.skillPackSyncFailed: Some skill packs failed to sync. Please try again.
skills.signInMarketplace: Sign in to manage marketplace skills.
skills.marketplaceAdminOnly: Only organization owners and admins can manage skills.
skills.noGatewaysDesc: Create a gateway first, then return here to manage installs.
skills.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, description, category, pack, source...
skills.noMarketplaceSkillsDesc: Add packs first, then synced skills will appear here.
skills.skillDescriptionPlaceholder: Short summary shown in the marketplace.
skills.skillUrlInvalid: Skill URL must be a GitHub repository URL (https://github.com/<owner>/<repo>).

onboarding.title: Mission Control profile
onboarding.description: Configure your mission control settings and preferences.
onboarding.name: Name
onboarding.timezoneNote: Your timezone is used to display all timestamps and schedule mission-critical events accurately.

invite.title: Organization Invite
invite.subtitle: Join your team in OpenClaw
invite.description: Paste the invite token or open the invite link you were sent.
invite.acceptDesc: Accept the invite to join the organization.
invite.signInPrompt: Sign in to accept your invite.
invite.accepted: Invite accepted. Redirecting to your organization…
invite.selectAccess: Select read or write access for at least one board.

calendar.title: Shared Calendar
calendar.description: View milestones, deadlines, and scheduled tasks across all agents.
calendar.signInPrompt: Sign in to view the calendar.
calendar.conflictWarning: This schedule conflicts with existing assignments.

teams.title: Agent Teams
teams.description: Manage agent teams, roles, and capabilities.
teams.adminOnly: Only organization admins can manage teams.
teams.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete the team and remove all members. This action cannot be undone.
teams.noTeamsDesc: Create your first agent team to organize agents by mission or capability.

commandCenter.title: Command Center
commandCenter.description: Real-time overview of all agents, gateways, and task operations.
commandCenter.signInPrompt: Sign in to access the Command Center.
commandCenter.adminOnly: Only organization admins can view the Command Center.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Hub
knowledge.description: Organization knowledge base with hybrid keyword and semantic search.

signedOut.message: Sign in to access the Knowledge Hub.

empty.title: No entries yet
empty.description: Create the first knowledge entry for your organization.

search.title: Search Results
search.noResultsHint: Try a different query or switch to hybrid search mode.

create.title: New Knowledge Entry
create.tagsPlaceholder: Add a tag and press Enter

chat.enterHint: Press Enter to send · Shift+Enter for new line
chat.emptyState: Send a message to start the conversation
chat.agentOffline: Agent is currently offline. Please try again later.
